newCollectionDescription:
A special collection for the Referendum 187 collaboration items with Evrloot.

The main collection can be found here: https://singular.app/collections/3208723ec6f65df810-ITEM

default.text:
'Vase'

In Referendum 187 the community voted on whether to upgrade the Encointer runtime to full functionality. As a common good parachain Encointer stands for promoting fairness and economic growth for everyone.
